attributes.additional_details: A19 would be useful with junction numbers junctions numbers will turn on the A19 From Junction 80 on A1.
attributes.background: Give the A19 Junctions Numbers Like the A1 Junction 1 A19, A19 is NOT a MOTORWAY but because J80 is the last junction number on the A1 SO IT SHOULD SWITCH to the A19 AND JUNCTION 1 be the sea burn roundabout junctions run always to the AND Junction Numbers Will End at the A168.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about something that is an operational decision for a government or parliamentary body, rather than decision about policy or legislation that is made by the Government or Parliament.

You could also raise this issue with the Government department responsible for national highways. You can find contact details for the Department for Transport here: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-transport
